```{r}
data = read.csv('../data/train.csv')
data = data[-1]
```

```{r}
library(arules)

selected_data = data[, c('Hillshade_9am', 'Hillshade_Noon', 'Hillshade_3pm')]

features_rules <- apriori(selected_data, parameter = list(support = 0.01, confidence = 0.5))
inspect(head(sort(features_rules, by="confidence"), 20))
```

```{r}

selected_data = data[, c('Horizontal_Distance_To_Hydrology', 'Horizontal_Distance_To_Roadways', 'Horizontal_Distance_To_Fire_Points')]

```
